greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows, A051731 * A000034 * 0^(n-k), 1<=k<=n.
comment: T(n,k) = 2 if k is even and divides n, 1 if k is odd and divides n; 0 otherwise.
formula: Triangle read by rows, A051731 * A000034 * 0^(n-k), 1<=k<=n; where A051731 = the inverse Mobius transform and A000034 = (1, 2, 1, 2, 1, 2,...).
example: First few rows of the triangle are:
results.author: Gary W. Adamson & _Mats Granvik_, Jul 25 2008
